sections.content: This Privacy Policy applies to the Rixx Corporation website, all subdomains, and the 'Rixx Official' mobile application available on the Google Play Store and any future platforms.

We may collect personal and business-related information including name, email address, phone number, account credentials, order details, plan or subscription data, and technical/browser/device information through tools such as Google Analytics, Firebase, or similar services.

Collected information is used to provide and improve services, process orders and subscriptions, authenticate users, communicate service updates, provide customer support, prevent fraud, comply with legal obligations, and analyze usage trends.

We use cookies, SDKs, and tracking technologies to maintain sessions, improve performance, analyze usage, and enhance user experience. Users may manage or disable cookies via browser or device settings, subject to functionality limitations.

Our mobile application may request access to internet connectivity, notifications, storage, or device identifiers strictly to enable core features such as authentication, file sharing, messaging, or service delivery. Permissions are requested transparently and only when required.

Payments are processed exclusively through secure third-party payment gateways. We do not store or process card numbers, UPI IDs, bank details, or wallet credentials. Limited transaction metadata such as order ID, amount, plan type, payment status, and timestamps may be retained for accounting, compliance, dispute resolution, and support purposes.

For subscription-based services, we store subscription status, validity period, renewal state, and associated plan details. Auto-renewal, if enabled, is governed by the respective payment provider. Users are responsible for managing cancellations prior to renewal cycles.

We may retain records of orders, service requests, chats, emails, call logs, and in-app communications to ensure service delivery, quality assurance, fraud prevention, legal compliance, and dispute handling.

We integrate third-party platforms such as payment gateways, analytics providers, cloud infrastructure, messaging services, and productivity tools. These services operate under their own privacy policies, and we are not responsible for their independent practices.

We apply reasonable technical, administrative, and organizational safeguards to protect personal data. While industry-standard measures are followed, no system can be guaranteed to be completely secure.
Personal and transactional data is retained only for as long as necessary to fulfill service obligations, comply with legal or regulatory requirements, resolve disputes, or enforce agreements.
Our services are not directed to individuals under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal data from minors. Any such data identified will be deleted upon verification.
Users may request access, correction, portability, or deletion of their personal data. Users in applicable jurisdictions may have additional rights under laws such as GDPR or CCPA.

Users may create accounts using email-based authentication or other supported login mechanisms. Account credentials are used solely for authentication and access control and are never shared with third parties.

Users may request deletion of their account and associated data via https://rixxcorp.xyz/delete-account.html. Requests are reviewed and processed within 7 business days, subject to verification and legal retention requirements.
By accessing or using our website, application, order pages, or services, you consent to the collection, use, and processing of information as described in this Privacy Policy.

Users must not misuse services, attempt unauthorized access, reverse-engineer systems, abuse plans, engage in fraudulent activity, or violate applicable laws or platform policies.

All trademarks, software, designs, content, code, systems, and materials are the intellectual property of Rixx Corporation unless otherwise stated. No ownership rights are transferred unless explicitly agreed in writing.

Submitting an order, plan purchase, or service request constitutes binding intent to engage. Final scope, timelines, and deliverables depend on the accuracy and completeness of information provided by the user.

Prices, features, and plan inclusions may change without prior notice. Subscription benefits are limited to the selected plan. Abuse, excessive usage, or policy violations may result in suspension or termination without refund.

Unless explicitly stated otherwise, all payments are non-refundable. Digital service delivery may begin immediately after payment. Refunds, if any, are governed solely by written policy or applicable law.
Failed, delayed, or reversed payments may result in restricted access, suspension, or termination of services. We are not responsible for payment gateway or banking failures.
Unless contractually agreed, users receive limited usage rights upon full payment. Redistribution, resale, sublicensing, or cloning of deliverables is prohibited.
We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts for fraud, abuse, policy violations, security risks, or non-compliance, without prior notice.
Services are provided on an 'as-is' and 'as-available' basis without warranties of any kind, including fitness for a particular purpose or uninterrupted availability.
To the maximum extent permitted by law, we are not liable for indirect, incidental, consequential, or business losses. Total liability, if any, is limited to the amount paid for the specific service.
We are not responsible for content, functionality, or practices of third-party websites or services linked or integrated with our platform.
We may update these Terms and Conditions at any time. Continued use of services after changes constitutes acceptance of the revised terms.
These terms are governed by the laws of India. Any disputes shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of courts located within India.
